review_text: Only slightly better airflow than a box fan for 4x more money! Some nice features like the reverse function to use as an exhaust fan, but definitely not worth the money. In reading other reviews a number of people have mentioned this as a "whole house" fan. They must live in a trailer because this doesn't even circulate enough air to make much of a difference in my 400sqft living room.
product_name: Lasko #2155A Electrically Reversible Window Fan, 16 Inches
